[et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ admin_label=”Hero – Split” _builder_version=”4.1″ custom_padding=”0px||0px||true|false” da_disable_devices=”off|off|off” collapsed=”on” global_colors_info=”{}” da_is_popup=”off” da_exit_intent=”off” da_has_close=”on” da_alt_close=”off” da_dark_close=”off” da_not_modal=”on” da_is_singular=”off” da_with_loader=”off” da_has_shadow=”on”][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_2,1_2″ use_custom_gutter=”on” gutter_width=”1″ make_equal=”on” _builder_version=”4.8.1″ background_color=”#1e4a75″ width=”100%” max_width=”100%” custom_padding=”0px||0px||true|false” collapsed=”on” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.1″ border_width_left=”30px” border_color_left=”#1c3f68″ global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.8.1″ text_text_color=”#BED8CB” text_font_size=”21px” header_font=”|||on|||||” header_text_color=”#bed8cb” header_letter_spacing=”1px” background_layout=”dark” width=”400px” max_width_tablet=”” max_width_phone=”80%” max_width_last_edited=”on|phone” module_alignment=”center” custom_margin=”125px||125px||true|false” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Business Lifecycle

We’re with you every step of the way

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.8.1″ background_image=”https://www.johnsonconsulting.com/wp-content/uploads/2021/07/man-with-glasses.jpg” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_code admin_label=”Empty Spacer” _builder_version=”4.1″ global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_code][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ admin_label=”Text Centered – with Flag” _builder_version=”4.3.4″ background_color=”#F0F0F0″ custom_padding=”0px||0px||true|false” da_disable_devices=”off|off|off” collapsed=”off” global_colors_info=”{}” da_is_popup=”off” da_exit_intent=”off” da_has_close=”on” da_alt_close=”off” da_dark_close=”off” da_not_modal=”on” da_is_singular=”off” da_with_loader=”off” da_has_shadow=”on”][et_pb_row admin_label=”Flag Row” _builder_version=”4.1″ custom_padding=”0px||0px||true|false” collapsed=”on” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.1″ global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_image src=”https://www.johnsonconsulting.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/01/hero-flag.svg” align=”center” _builder_version=”4.1″ global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row admin_label=”Lifecycle Graphic + Text” _builder_version=”4.1″ custom_padding=”75px||75px||true|false” collapsed=”off” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.1″ global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.14.7″ text_line_height=”2.1em” header_2_font_size=”25px” header_2_line_height=”1.28em” text_orientation=”center” max_width=”780px” module_alignment=”center” hover_enabled=”0″ global_colors_info=”{}” sticky_enabled=”0″]

From start to finish, you can count on Johnson Consulting

Whether you recently purchased your business, or are looking to sell, Johnson Consulting can help you at any stage of your business lifecycle. We are a team of highly experienced and reliable professionals who can help you grow your business, maximize its value, and guide you in determining precisely the right time to sell.

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_image src=”https://www.johnsonconsulting.com/wp-content/uploads/2021/07/JCG-Business-Lifecycle.png” title_text=”JCG-Business-Lifecycle” align=”center” _builder_version=”4.8.1″ _module_preset=”default” width=”50%” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ admin_label=”Blurb Grid” _builder_version=”4.3.4″ custom_padding=”0px||0px||true|false” da_disable_devices=”off|off|off” collapsed=”off” global_colors_info=”{}” da_is_popup=”off” da_exit_intent=”off” da_has_close=”on” da_alt_close=”off” da_dark_close=”off” da_not_modal=”on” da_is_singular=”off” da_with_loader=”off” da_has_shadow=”on”][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_2,1_2″ use_custom_gutter=”on” gutter_width=”1″ make_equal=”on” _builder_version=”4.1″ width=”100%” max_width=”100%” custom_padding=”0px||0px||true|false” collapsed=”off” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.1″ custom_padding=”50px||50px||true|false” border_width_right=”1px” border_color_right=”#F0F0F0″ border_width_bottom=”1px” border_color_bottom=”#F0F0F0″ global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_blurb title=”Buying” image=”https://www.johnsonconsulting.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/02/business-succession-plan.png” admin_label=”Exit Blurb” _builder_version=”4.13.0″ header_font_size=”20px” body_line_height=”1.8em” text_orientation=”center” width=”400px” max_width=”90%” module_alignment=”center” custom_margin=”||25px||false|false” custom_padding=”||||false|false” animation=”off” global_colors_info=”{}”]

We begin with an in depth analysis of your business buying goals to better understand what success looks like for you. We’ll then work with you to identify which business offers the best opportunity to meet those goals, and guide you through the entire buying process.

[/et_pb_blurb][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.1″ custom_padding=”50px||50px||true|false” border_width_bottom=”1px” border_color_bottom=”#F0F0F0″ global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_blurb title=”Growth” image=”https://www.johnsonconsulting.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/02/strategic-pricing-initiative.png” admin_label=”Buying Blurb” _builder_version=”4.13.0″ header_font_size=”20px” body_line_height=”1.8em” text_orientation=”center” width=”400px” max_width=”90%” module_alignment=”center” custom_margin=”||25px||false|false” custom_padding=”||||false|false” animation=”off” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Our team of experienced specialists is focused on helping your business reach its full potential. From planning, to operations, to accounting, we can help you maximize performance and results in every facet of your business.

[/et_pb_blurb][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_2,1_2″ use_custom_gutter=”on” gutter_width=”1″ make_equal=”on” _builder_version=”4.1″ width=”100%” max_width=”100%” custom_padding=”0px||0px||true|false” collapsed=”off” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.1″ custom_padding=”50px||50px||true|false” border_width_right=”1px” border_color_right=”#F0F0F0″ border_width_bottom=”1px” border_color_bottom=”#F0F0F0″ global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_blurb title=”Valuation” image=”https://www.johnsonconsulting.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/02/consulting-services.png” admin_label=”Valuation Blurb” _builder_version=”4.13.0″ header_font_size=”20px” body_line_height=”1.8em” text_orientation=”center” width=”400px” max_width=”90%” module_alignment=”center” custom_margin=”||25px||false|false” custom_padding=”||||false|false” animation=”off” global_colors_info=”{}”]

As a business owner, understanding the value of your business is essential to your growth and exit strategy. Our valuation system reveals exactly how much your business is worth at any given time based on its assets, the market environment, and industry trends.

[/et_pb_blurb][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.1″ custom_padding=”50px||50px||true|false” border_width_bottom=”1px” border_color_bottom=”#F0F0F0″ global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_blurb title=”Exit” image=”https://www.johnsonconsulting.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/02/sell-my-business.png” admin_label=”Growth Blurb” _builder_version=”4.13.0″ header_font_size=”20px” body_line_height=”1.8em” text_orientation=”center” width=”400px” max_width=”90%” module_alignment=”center” custom_margin=”||25px||false|false” custom_padding=”||||false|false” animation=”off” global_colors_info=”{}”]

When the time comes to sell, we’ll offer guidance and support every step of the way. We’ll identify the right buyer and oversee the process to make sure that all of your goals are met at the highest possible selling price.

[/et_pb_blurb][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ admin_label=”CTA with Background Image – Global” _builder_version=”4.1″ use_background_color_gradient=”on” background_color_gradient_start=”rgba(30,74,117,0.92)” background_color_gradient_end=”rgba(30,74,117,0.92)” background_color_gradient_overlays_image=”on” background_image=”https://www.johnsonconsulting.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/02/services-cta-bg.jpg” da_disable_devices=”off|off|off” global_module=”286″ saved_tabs=”all” collapsed=”on” global_colors_info=”{}” da_is_popup=”off” da_exit_intent=”off” da_has_close=”on” da_alt_close=”off” da_dark_close=”off” da_not_modal=”on” da_is_singular=”off” da_with_loader=”off” da_has_shadow=”on”][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.1″ collapsed=”on” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.1″ global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_image src=”https://www.johnsonconsulting.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/01/icon-conversation.svg” align=”center” _builder_version=”4.1″ global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_image][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.8.1″ text_line_height=”2.1em” header_2_font_size=”25px” text_orientation=”center” background_layout=”dark” width=”780px” max_width=”90%” module_alignment=”center” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Let’s start the conversation

With a clear understanding of where the profession has been, and a compelling vision of where it’s going, we help our clients reach new levels of success. Let’s talk about how we can do the same for you.

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_button button_url=”@ET-DC@eyJkeW5hbWljIjp0cnVlLCJjb250ZW50IjoicG9zdF9saW5rX3VybF9wYWdlIiwic2V0dGluZ3MiOnsicG9zdF9pZCI6IjQ0ODgifX0=@” button_text=”Get In Touch” button_alignment=”center” _builder_version=”4.1″ _dynamic_attributes=”button_url” custom_button=”on” button_text_color=”#ffffff” button_bg_color=”#cc7022″ button_border_width=”0px” button_font=”Bitter||||||||” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_button][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section]
